title: It's Just My Nature!: A Guide to Knowing and Living Your True Nature
description: Why do we use the term Human Nature? What do we mean by nature? What does it mean when we say someone has a natural gift? Where does this gift come from? Best-selling author Carol Tuttle provides compelling and life changing answers to these simple questions in her newest book It s Just My Nature! It s Just My Nature! reveals a startlingly accurate method for assessing your personality and behavioral tendencies with a new system called Energy Profiling TM. Energy Profiling is a unique system that helps define personality traits, as well as human behavior and physical characteristics, to reveal the true you. Discover those characteristics (Types) that markedly resemble you and those close to you. Learn that what you may have considered your greatest weaknesses is actually your greatest gift. Understand why people act the way they do and discover how you can enjoy harmony with anyone. Develop the skill to assess your Type and the Types of others. Find renewed peace with yourself and in your relationships Just by looking at someone and reading their facial features and body language you will know their Type and their true nature.
author: Carol Tuttle
